subject: Custom Curves in Sim Pedals Config
description_text:
Hello,

I have purchased a set of Simsonn Pro pedals in September 2024 and have
been configuring the settings with the Sim Pedals Config V4.1 software. I
love the product and it works great!

I was wondering if it is possible to customize the curve profiles, at the
moment I am only able to select presets: linear, exponential, etc.
I'd like to be able to fine tune the curves to suit my braking style, the
individual points along the curve get highlighted when I hover the mouse
over them, however I cannot shift their position.

Is it not a feature in this software? If so, would it be possible to update
the software to implement this functionality?

Thank you for the clarifications,
Lucas

conversations.body_text: Hi LG,  You can upgrade to our latest software, SIMSONN Manager version 2.0.8. After launching the software, go to the settings menu and manually update the firmware by selecting the firmware-pedals-plus.sfu file. Once the upgrade is complete, you’ll be able to access the new configuration features in the updated software.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

Perfect, thank you for your help! That's exactly what I needed.

On Mon, 16 Jun 2025 at 02:38, support@simsonn.com
